name: Swarm of Books
conditionImmune: charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned, grappled

trait.name: Swarm
text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny book. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm's space. 5 (2d4) bludgeoning damage, or 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

description:
Animated books which form a swarm when disturbed
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 156
